definition[0]: someone with special knowledge and experience who is employed to help a business that is losing money and which may have to close
example[0]: The ailing engineering firm has called in a company doctor after shedding 90 staff.
definition[1]: a medical doctor who is employed by a company to treat people who are sick or injured at work, and to give general advice on health
example[1]: Both my own doctor and the company doctor failed to diagnose my illness.
